name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content:
At present, a group of pictures of Chinese students in Israel are circulating on the Internet.
In the picture, students asked when the evacuation would be arranged, saying that their classmates from other countries had been taken away by their countries. They also asked when the embassy would condemn Hamas to ensure the safety of local Chinese.
However, they were warned by embassy staff "not to post irrelevant content and chat in the group"
The students lamented that they realized that Wolf Warrior was the biggest rumor after going abroad.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content: https://t.co/pbo1JdbgsJ

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content:
According to local Chinese in Israel, the Chinese Embassy in Israel has completely fallen apart.
In the local Chinese community, it only sends messages like a repeater asking everyone to pay attention to their own safety, and does not answer everyone's questions at all. It also does not collect information on people or provide effective refuge information.
Even the embassy phone number is no longer accessible.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content: Up to now, the Chinese Embassy in Israel still has not taken any rescue actions or arrangements, but after hearing that the screenshots in the group were circulated on Twitter, it began to respond quickly and is checking local Chinese and international students one by one.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content:
On October 14, the media revealed that Nanjing University of Chinese Medicine forced students to rehearse late at night in order to welcome the school anniversary.
The students complained to the teacher because it was too cold at night. The teacher said that everything should be for the effect. You are all actors and you must have the necessary cultivation.
The students angrily said that we are not actors and we have no money.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content:
On October 15, the media revealed that the Hegui Girl costume at the closing ceremony of the Asian Games was suspected of plagiarism, but the girl was blocked by her senior sister when she defended her rights.
The cause was that in April 2023, the student was introduced by the class group to intern in the costume design of a major project, and added the senior sister of the same department who was in charge.
The senior sister suggested that everyone should design the Hegui Girl's clothes, and then the student sent her first draft design and final draft design to the senior sister in a private message.
But the senior sister replied "OK", and then disappeared, and there was no discussion of the project in the design group.
Until the performance of the major project, the student found that the Hegui Girl costume in the senior sister's circle of friends was similar to the design she had sent to the senior sister before, and then found the senior sister to ask about the situation.
However, the senior sister did not give a positive answer to the student's question about the similar design concept.
Because there was no reply, the student chose to defend his rights through the Internet, but found that he had been blocked by the senior sister on various platforms.
And this senior sister is also a senior designer who has participated in the costume design of many films and major events. I don't understand why a designer like this could design such a highly similar work after seeing the design drawings of this classmate.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content:
At present, a strange incident is going viral in the circle of studying abroad in Israel.
A foreign student who had previously studied in Jerusalem and had actually returned to China sent private messages to many classmates, hoping to find local foreign students to shoot positive energy videos. The requirements of the video: filming in an air-raid shelter, saying that the consulate has been calming the emotions of foreign students, and Chinese planes have been maintaining capacity to transport students back to China, etc.
After being rejected by all classmates for lying, she decided to do it herself, filming a video in China and pretending to be in Israel, saying that she was in an air-raid shelter, that planes from other countries had stopped operating, that Chinese planes had been maintaining capacity, and that the embassy and the student union were actively rescuing and other false information.
Her IP was discovered by netizens to be in Beijing. Later, many classmates posted screenshots of the student asking them to record a video and admitting that she was not in Israel on the Internet.
As for why she asked someone to record the video and why she finally recorded the video herself, the classmates did not know. (Video in the comment section)

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content:
Residents of several communities in Zhengzhou Economic Development Zone reported that they need to buy insurance before they can get gas.
China Resources Gas Company said that users can buy it voluntarily and it is not mandatory.
But residents said that if they don't buy insurance, they will be considered unqualified, and if they pay the money, they will be qualified.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content:
It's settled!
On October 15, Chinese Foreign Minister Wang Yi spoke with the foreign ministers of Saudi Arabia, Iran and Turkey, and said:
Israel's behavior has gone beyond the scope of self-defense
China supports Islamic countries to strengthen unity and coordination on the Palestinian issue and speak with one voice
China is willing to work with Saudi Arabia and other Arab countries to continue to support Palestine's just cause of restoring and safeguarding national rights
China will support all measures that are conducive to promoting the implementation of the "two-state solution"
